name: image-handler
description: A Lambda function for performing on-demand image edits and manipulations.

scripts.build:init: rm -rf package-lock.json && rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.build:zip: cd src/ && zip -rq ../image-handler.zip . -x *.test.js */*.test.js && cd .. && zip -rqu image-handler.zip node_modules/ package.json package-lock.json
scripts.build: npm run build:init && npm install --production && npm run build:zip && npm run build:dist
